
Run SEISMIC-RNA
================================================================================

You can run the SEISMIC-RNA workflow in two ways:

- Run all steps automatically using ``seismic wf`` (see :doc:`./wf`).
- Run each step individually using its command (e.g. ``seismic align`` for the
  Align step).

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    demult
    align
    relate
    pool
    mask
    cluster
    join
    table
    fold
    graph
    export
    wf
